DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate relative efficacy centrally-acting analgesic ( duloxetine ) versus peripherally act analgesic ( topical diclofenac ) pain associate symptom management knee osteoarthritis . Secondary objective include determination self-report experimental pain measure best differentiate respond well duloxetine diclofenac .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , blind , crossover , control study design compare duloxetine topical diclofenac osteoarthritis pain . The study cohort individual confirm diagnosis knee osteoarthritis . Subjects randomize entry criterion meet . These individual evaluate baseline , follow longitudinally follow enrollment .
